column4: i messed up my sound somehow. i did everything i couls do from !sound, and it didnt work. i still have no sound. can anyone help with my issue?
have you set the alsamixer ctrls ?
i dont know how to do that
i just ran alsamixer, and everything is up max volume
open the terminal and type alsamixer, then make sure there are no M for mute in the ctrl boxes and sliders at 75%  or more.
i just ran alsamixer, and everything is up max volume
i just ran alsamixer, and everything was already up at max volume, i should say
make sure there are no M's in the boxes at the bottom of the ctrls, GodricBrutus

i messed up my sound somehow. i did everything i couls do from !sound, and it didnt work. i still have no sound. i ran alsamixer, and everything is alraedy on max volume; nothing is on 'M'. When i go to 'sound preferences', under hardware, there is nothing listed. can anyone help with my issue?
ok do you have pulseaudio installed ?
